Reviews.Title: “BEWARE DO NOT STAY HERE!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Trinia C
Reviews.Content: Please people if u love ur family do not stay here..Am not being funny AT ALL!! This place is a DUMP!!! It is meant for prostitutes,drug dealers, and drug addicts.. It was NASTY the health department need to SHUT It down. There is no way someone could sleep good here.. Please find somewhere else to go..Every thing was run down i was scared to touch anything,,Please KEEP DRIVING PAST!!!

Reviews.Title: “Unsafe, filthy - worst place I've ever stayed”
Reviews.Author: traveler91047
Reviews.Content: My manager booked this motel because it was close to our client site. The rooms were filthy and the area is unsafe. There were too choices for the heat ... full blast and off. Since it was cold outside, I opted for full blast, which resulted in a room temperature of about 92 degrees. There are dozens of cats roaming the exterior of the property, along with food dishes, etc. -- presumably to address a rodent problem (I did not see any rodents). The front desk is safely behind bulletproof glass and, depending on the time of night, a retractable steel curtain. That will give you an idea of how safe you are in your room with large plate glass window and flimsy door lock. I slept maybe 2-3 hours per night -- maybe -- with lights on the whole time. We did not return, needless to say. If it had not been for the fact that I was a brand new employee, I would have refused to stay there. I regret I allowed someone to put me in danger for three nights.

Reviews.Title: “SLEEP WITH THE LIGHTS ON.”
Reviews.Author: Kimmeecat
Reviews.Content: Sleep with the lights on. That is, if you can sleep at all with a COCKROACH IN YOUR BED. When reported to the front desk, the response was "It happens" and "People from FLORIDA bring them". I wish we had read some of the reviews of this bug motel before we gave them our debit card. After reading some we went to the front desk and shared what we found so they could see what their guests were writing about their experiences. We got a new room and 20% off the bill. But here it is 2am and I'm wondering if we just might sleep better in our car. By the way, the air conditioner in the first room didn't work well at all. Personally, I'd rather be hot than share my bed with bugs... But that's just me.

Reviews.Title: “bad area not some where u want to be many live in this hotel!”
Reviews.Author: hiller15242
Reviews.Content: payed 100 dollers a night after the 1st howr wanted are money back smelled bad like urane in the hal ways. evert thing about the room was falling apart. do not bring your kits to this area. you can pay by the hower? never heard of such a thing. over seas if you get my drift. do your home work and read the review's

Reviews.Title: “Worst Hotel I ever stayed at!”
Reviews.Author: CDW5226
Reviews.Content: This place is a DUMP!!! Paid $100 for a night/room for a golf foursome in order to attend the Yankees game in Baltimore. The room was dirty. Bathroom was falling apart. The area looked dangerous. Thank God I didn't bring my family! Taxi driver tried to rip us off. All around HORRIBLE experience. We had booked two nights, but left after one TERRIBLE night!! Stay near the BWI airport for a better experience!

Reviews.Title: “Do Not Even Consider this Hotel”
Reviews.Author: dogloverabby
Reviews.Content: This hotel was very run down. The Front desk people were unresponsive and condisending. The rooms where clean but when we booked our hotel we asked for a crib for our grandson and when we checked in we also requested that crib. After going site seeing for the night we got back to find no crib for my grandson and when my son called down they said they didnt have anyone there he told them he would come down and get the crib but they said that would not work because that department was closed. The next morning the front desk personal were less than helpful. It is not in a very nice neighborhood either. BE AWARE DO NOT STAY I CANT SAY THIS LOUD OR LONG ENOUGH DO NOT STAY

Reviews.Title: “This is a hotel??”
Reviews.Author: Kelli44
Reviews.Content: How can this be a chain hotel service. We stayed here one night on our way down to Virginia Beach. Only meant to be for one night. We checked in at 8pm. We first entered the room and were greeted by 2 roaches, on the pillow no less. Went to management and asked for a new pillow he grunted and after 15 minutes finally gave us our pillows with another grunt. So we went back to the room. 3 more roaches appeared at 11:30pm. We left at 1 am and drove straight to Virginia beach. Please don't stay here DRIVE AWAY FAR AWAY!!

Reviews.Title: “Gross, Prostitution Inn is what this place should be called!”
Reviews.Author: jessicagnon
Reviews.Content: Prostitutes. Dirty rooms. Broken security lock on door. Nothing good to say here. After a 4 hr drive from NJ myself and two others checked into our hotel room around 12am and began to settle in. 30 minutes later my husband stepped outside to smoke and was accosted by what appeared to be two prostitutes demanding cigarettes, so he did. From that point on, we were awoken by the slamming door of the room next store every 30 minutes or so. We can only imagine this was due to 'frequent guests' visiting the room next occupied by prostitutes. We hoped that this was only and issue for the first night of our stay and remained hopeful that the second night would be better. However the same happened the next night, and it was worse. We had an African American man knock on our door at 3am. We told him to leave and then heard someone next door escort him into their room. This was the worst hotel experience EVER!

Reviews.Title: “Made me mad enought to write a review”
Reviews.Author: BobW999
Reviews.Content: My wife booked online through hotels.com without checking reviews. The Redsox were playing Orioles that weekend and everything was booked up. However, even the Bostonians stayed away from this place. It looked like the motel from the Psycho and Halloween movies. Loaded with transients, the city must put the homeless up there. Anyhow, I am not against that, but when I take my grandkids to visit someplace for the weekend, I don't want to deal with that. The room smelled, was small and cramped. Besides the transients living there, it appears they hire some of them to staff the place as well. Worse the motel charged us as well as Hotels.com and we had to fight like hell to get it all sorted out. We got there late in the evening so had to stay for the night, but pulled out at sunrise. Lessons to take away, 1. check out the reviews, 2. don't use Hotels.com, they have bad customer service and I always find the hotel motel cheaper by using the hotel's own website. One last thing, pool was terrible too.

Reviews.Title: “worst hotel I've ever stayed in!!”
Reviews.Author: dogbull40
Reviews.Content: The only good point of this hotel was its location. Close to inner harbor. None smoking room smelled like smoke. Wall paper in sleeping area and bathroom was pealing off the wall. Carpet, that extended up the wall, was off the wall. Bathroom was dirty, tub was stained water damage on ceiling. This is no joke. The inside door handle fell off!!! I fixed it myself and put it on backwards. My teenage childern loved the 12 cable stations they had to choose from. The pool looked beautiful but all you could do was look. The gate was locked all 3 days we stayed there. The reason for it not being open was there was no life gaurd. Hotel was in ghetto, We were afraid to go out after dark. We will never go back!!!!

Reviews.Title: “The vomit said it all”
Reviews.Author: travelbobKalamazoo
Reviews.Content: I'm not really sure which was the worst part. Maybe it was the rodents living in the room? Maybe it was the vomit in the stairway? Maybe it was the bad service at the desk? Or, possibly, it was the garbage in the hallways and parking lot. If you care about your travelling companions, or yourself, steer clear of this one.

Reviews.Title: “Don't even think about it!!!”
Reviews.Author: Kris6747
Reviews.Content: Facility is very dirty. Our non-smoking room smelled of cigarette smoke and you can see a line of dust around the entire room. Mold/mildew in shower and the ceiling is damaged from the mildew. Our door had been vandalized and poorly repaired. Sidewalks, stairwells are very dirty. Front desk less than helpful. DO NOT STAY HERE!!!! Just keep on driving. You'll be glad you did. The restaurant next to the hotel provided decent food/drink and had a great Jazz band so we made the best of it, but it was a bit scary and like other reviews we couldn't wait to check out! Does not represent Quality Inn or Choice Hotels well.

Reviews.Title: “awful,dirty,yucky place”
Reviews.Author: cntryFl
Reviews.Content: This place was dirty. The bathroom floor and tub were very dirty. A bug was found. The fridge had 2 inches of ice in it and the hotel clerk didn't care that meds needed refridgeration. The list to address was getting longer as the staff there was not helpful nor cared. Next came the mouse in the room. Still yet getting a new room was difficult.. Assistance was needed to move into a new handicap room and the desk clerk said no one was available to help at all. Not a place to stay at all.

Reviews.Title: “Couldn't check out fast enough”
Reviews.Author: NonnyMouse
Reviews.Content: I booked a room because I needed to be near Kernan Hospital which is nearby and I didn't have a car. The hotel was supposed to have a shuttle. I checked in and when I asked about the shuttle they looked at me with a blank stare. The room was in the back, on the ground floor with a view of an overflowing dumpster. It was dirty, small, the bed sagged, and the smell of smoke in this 'non-smoking' room was overpowering. I tried to make the best of it, but after seeing the secuity chain had been broken on the door and the soft drink machine was smashed in, I went to the front desk and checked out immediately. When they asked why, I told them the hotel was not acceptable and they did not seem surprised. They told me I would have to pay for the room anyway and to contact the manager. I did contact him later via email and received a return message apologizing and saying I would be refunded the money. I never did get the refund and no response to later email asking where it was.

Reviews.Title: “Very Scary Place”
Reviews.Author: serenityshores
Reviews.Content: I will never stay at this property again. I've stayed here a few times in the last two years and it continues to go downhill. I was there over this past weekend. I had a ground floor room in the back of the property to avoid freeway noise in the front. First, the rooms are VERY tiny. Barely enough room to move around in. The rooms are grimy. I had a non-smoking room but it did smell of smoke; they just used a deodorizer to cover it up and it didn't do a good job. Two of the outlets didn't work. I got the room for free because I used some points from my Choice Privileges membership. I still should have gotten another hotel. There was a lot of suspicious activity going on. Loud boom box type of music blaring from cars and people loitering in the parking lot. There were small groups of people coming and going in and out of the property that were clearly not hotel guests. I felt very scared being there. There were people drinking out in the parking lot and I also believe that there were drugs deals going down. I called the front desk to report these things. They said there weren't any problems that they were aware of. Sure. I asked for the name of the property manager and the front desk didn't even ask if there was anything they could do to help me. That spoke volumes. I could stay there for free again with my Choice membership, but I will not. My safety is more important.

Reviews.Title: “NOT WORTH THE MONEY”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Quality Inn on Security Blvd in Baltimore, MD. The motel was old and dirty. We had to move to another room because the smell was so bad. The room we moved to was much better. The cleaning crew was good and did everything to make our stay bearable. Management knew that this motel was going to be full to capacity and the elevators were not working and no one showed up to fix them...need I say more????

HotelInfo.Name: Quality Inn West
HotelInfo.Address: 6700 Security Blvd., Baltimore, MD 21207
